titleStmt.title: Logos agōnios; or, a sermon of the Christian race, preached before His Maiesty at Christ-Church in Oxford, May 9. 1643. By Tho: Barton Master of Arts, and yet Rector of Westminster in Sussex. Whereto is added an advertisement to his country-men, who being misled disaffect the royall cause.
titleStmt.author: Barton, Thomas, 1599 or 1600-1682 or 3.

titleStmt.title: Logos agōnios; or, a sermon of the Christian race, preached before His Maiesty at Christ-Church in Oxford, May 9. 1643. By Tho: Barton Master of Arts, and yet Rector of Westminster in Sussex. Whereto is added an advertisement to his country-men, who being misled disaffect the royall cause.
titleStmt.author: Barton, Thomas, 1599 or 1600-1682 or 3.

notesStmt.note: The first two words in the title are printed in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
